[DAY 8/8 OF GIVEAWAY] 
It‚Äôs the last giveaway of this series and we will be giving away the Bluetooth Headphone as requested! 

To take part in this giveaway, simply
1. Comment with your best answer to the following question if your relatives ask: "When are you having kids?" 
2. Share this post

We will say: Are you kidding? :p

[DAY 7/8 OF GIVEAWAY] 
Happy Valentine‚Äôs Day to all our O-Fans! We have 2 pairs of Movie Tickets up for grabs.

To take part in our second last giveaway, simply
1. Comment with your best answer to the following question if your relatives ask: "When are you getting married?"
2. Share this post

We will say: When your Ang Bao is ready. :p
What are you hoping to receive this Valentine‚Äôs Day? Tag dial one here and drop some hints! ;) #OPPOR11s

[DAY 6/8 OF GIVEAWAY] 
And they never give up. So we are giving away another set of exclusive OPPO Lens Kit! #HuatWouldYouSay 

To take part in this giveaway, simply
1. Comment with your best answer to the following question if your relatives ask: ‚ÄúDo you know of anyone suitable for you? Not young anymore, leh.‚Äù 
2. Share this post

We will say: But the night is still young, cheers! ;)

Still looking for a Valentine‚Äôs Day gift? The OPPO R11s may just be the perfect one! Only on 14th February, purchase the Red OPPO R11s at any OPPO Concept Store and receive a pair of complimentary Movie Tickets*. How‚Äôs this combination for a date? ;) *While stocks last.

[DAY 5/8 OF GIVEAWAY] 
An inevitable question every Chinese New Year‚Ä¶ #HuatWouldYouSay To take part in this giveaway, simply

1. Comment with your best answer to the following question if your relatives ask: "Do you have a boyfriend/girlfriend?"
2. Share this post

We will say: Yes, we have love letters. Yummy. <3

[DAY 4/8 OF GIVEAWAY] 
Weight for it, questions are getting tougher! But how about winning a pair of Bluetooth Headphone? #HuatWouldYouSay

To take part in this giveaway, simply
1. Comment with your best answer to the following question if your relatives ask: ‚ÄúEat more, leh! Why do you eat so little?‚Äù
2. Share this post

We will say: Eating whenever you are not looking! :p

[DAY 3/8 OF GIVEAWAY] 
Here‚Äôs one for those who have savvy relatives! And you deserve to win a pair of Movie Tickets just because. #HuatWouldYouSay

To take part in this giveaway, simply
1. Comment with your best answer to the following question if your relatives ask: ‚ÄúWhy haven‚Äôt you accepted my Facebook/Instagram request?‚Äù
2. Share this post

We will say: Later, ok! Do you want some pineapple tarts? ;)

[DAY 2/8 OF GIVEAWAY]
Brace yourself for the second part! And we are giving away the exclusive OPPO Lens Kit this time. #HuatWouldYouSay

To take part in this giveaway, simply
1. Comment with your best answer to the following question if your relatives ask: ‚ÄúHow much are you earning now, ah?‚Äù
2. Share this post

We will say: Hopefully more with the Red Packets collected. ;)

[DAY 1/8 OF GIVEAWAY]
So this is how it goes! Every Chinese New Year, we get some ruff questions that we probably do not want to answer from the relatives but #HuatWouldYouSay? Suggest a reply to help the rest and you may win a pair of Movie Tickets for yourself! ;)

To take part in this giveaway, simply
1. Comment with your best answer to the following question if your relatives ask: ‚ÄúWhat are you working as now?‚Äù
2. Share this post

We will say: As a full-time Facebook user. :p
It‚Äôs going be a pawsperous year ahead with our 8 days of giveaway starting from tomorrow! Share this post if you‚Äôre ready to huat. ;) #HuatWouldYouSay

Introducing the new A75 that takes camera phones to the next generation. Equipped with a 20MP A.I. Beauty Front Camera, 16MP rear camera, 6.0-inch FHD+ Full Screen, 4GB RAM, 3200mAh battery, and a delicate linear finish at the back, it captures you in more ways than one. ;) 

Available now in Black and Champagne, at all Concept Stores, Telcos and OPPO Online Store: www.oppostore.com.sg #OPPOA75
